entry.title: New release for Manage My Damn Life: v0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

    • Fix for builds failing on read the docs. by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/111
    • Fix for builds failing on read the docs. by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/112
    • Bump to version 0.4.2 by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/113
  • Revert "- Bump to version 0.4.2" by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/114
    • Bump to version 0.4.2 by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/115
  • Remove dead link in README.md by @MrMineDe in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/117
  • Filter fix dec23 by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/119
  • Hydration fix by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/120
    • Fixed error faced during adding of parent task. by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/121
    • Updated tasks/list view by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/122
  • v0.4.2 by @intri-in in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/123

New Contributors

  • @MrMineDe made their first contribution in https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/pull/117

Full Changelog: https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Manage My Damn Life: v0.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Moved save button to top in TaskEditor and Event Editor.
  • Fixed #138
    • Event is now removed from view.
  • Fixed bug: Default calendar id is ignored if it isn't valid.
  • Changed button size in AddTask bar. -Dark mode
  • Now has dark mode for users of the vampiric persuasion.
  • Fixed #152
    • Now Caldav registration is done via a POST request.
  • Fixed problems of duplication of calendars post adding a new CalDAV account.
  • Fixed list of caldav accounts not updating after adding or deleting a caldav account.
  • Fixed Force sync button's function in /accounts/caldav page.
  • Logout now deletes the local dexie db for security.
  • Fixed #140
  • Fixed flickering of Quick Add info modal.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/intri-in/manage-my-damn-life-nextjs/compare/v0.4.4...v0.4.5
